sourcesContent:
<template>
    <apexChart  type="bar" :options="chartOptions" :series="series"></apexChart>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name:"BarChart",
    data: function() {
      return {
        chartOptions: {
          chart: {
            id: 'bar'
          },
          xaxis: {
            categories: [1991, 1992, 1993, 1994, 1995, 1996, 1997, 1998]
          }
        },
        series: [{
          name: 'series-1',
          data: [30, 40, 45, 50, 49, 60, 70, 91]
        }]
      }
    },
  }
</script>
